title: Bitfinex not affected by the PBOC decision
content: The BusinessInsider article was a prime example of FUD anyway.

title: PSA: Don't send ETH from Bitstamp to Bitfinex
Economics of Proof of Stake
content: Proof of stake shows off the extraordinary ability of crypto news portals to write a 500 word article that says absolutely nothing, and the amazing regard of the ETH boss crew to Social Justice.

title: Gary Vee on Ethereum
content: Video of gary Vee endorsing Ethereum when asked about it by a fan.

title: Huobi is adding ETH on May 31st
content: Huobi announced an announcement this morning, many had high hopes for the withdrawal situation update -- but it's "just" ETH trading.

title: How the legacy finance might be feeling about cryptocurrencies
content: This comes from a mainstream finance & investing newsletter.

title: Is the end of ICOs approaching?
content: The very first ICO-ish thing was fined heavily. Will new regulations pop the ICO bubble?

title: About the proposed Ethereum ETF
content: The surveillance section of EtherIndex's rule change (which after the Winklevoss' BTC ETF seems to be the key part) proposes a strategy which might be more plausible.

title: Cryptosignal - New tool for Ethereum traders
content: A data scientist created a free tool that lets you correlate the dollar price of ETH with hash rate, difficulty or daily number of transactions - that's a free altcoin trading signal.

title: Alphabay to adopt ETH for payments ahead of new privacy features
content: With ZCash on Ethereum (ZoE) a fundamental change in ETH is possibly ahead.

title: Bitcoin ETF rejected, Ethereum ETF is probably off the table too
content: The proposed BTC ETF was rejected by the SEC because of lack of regulations in crypto exchanges - a reason that holds true for Ethereum too

title: Trezor (SatoshiLabs) added DASH wallet and ZCASH wallet
content: Trezor now added native support for DASH and ZCASH - and explained what the altcoin needs to get supported (looking at you, Monero).

title: Back to Basics: How to buy altcoins
content: They say you need bitcoin to get altcoins but the fiat to alt markets are slowly appearing on previously bitcoin-only exchanges. For the <strike>gambling</strike> trading you need the liquidity of Alt/BTC pairs though.

title: Ethereum sentiment - Where to get reliable information?
content: Now right in the midst of The DAO (ETH), LISK (BTC) and Coinbase rebranding to GDAX

title: Value of Altcoins: Money and Tokens
content: Altcoin value: Some altcoins are meant for payments and remittance, some altcoins are network tokens.
